This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
Survivors hit with a Pounce Attack suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

Plague.name: Drop of Perfume
Plague.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect within Victor's Shriek range when controlling Charlotte.
"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons, 1602

Plague.name: Forest Stew
Plague.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.6 m/s.
"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

Plague.name: Spinning Top
Plague.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
Causes Survivors hit with a Pounce to drop any carried Item.
"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

Plague.name: Victor's Soldier
Plague.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds after crushing Victor when controlling Charlotte.
"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

Plague.name: Iridescent Pendant
Plague.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
Successful Pounce Attacks grant a stack-able +2 % Haste Status Effect to both Victor and Charlotte, up to a maximum of +8 %.
This effect is reset when a Survivor enters the Dying State by any means.
"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

Plague.name: Silencing Cloth
Plague.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
Whenever Victor is crushed, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.
"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

Ghost Face.name: "Philly"
Ghost Face.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.The film inside captured his last night in the city.
Reduces the Time to mark Survivors by -20 %.
"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face

Ghost Face.name: Cheap Cologne
Ghost Face.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.Reserved for impromptu visits.
Increases the duration of Marked by +10 seconds.

Ghost Face.name: Headline Cut-Outs
Ghost Face.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
Increases your Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

Ghost Face.name: Walleye's Matchbook
Ghost Face.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville.A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
Reduces the Recovery time of Night Shroud by -6 seconds.

Ghost Face.name: Cinch Straps
Ghost Face.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
Causes Night Shroud to remain active on missed Basic Attacks.

Ghost Face.name: Marked Map
Ghost Face.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +2 seconds.

Ghost Face.name: Olsen's Address Book
Ghost Face.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
The Auras of Marked Survivors performing rushed actions are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

Ghost Face.name: Olsen's Journal
Ghost Face.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

Ghost Face.name: Telephoto Lens
Ghost Face.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after revealing you.

Ghost Face.name: Chewed Pen
Ghost Face.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.Incriminating evidence that was never found.
Increases the Reveal time for Survivors in the Dying State to 3 seconds.

Ghost Face.name: Knife Belt Clip
Ghost Face.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -12 metres when Crouched.

Ghost Face.name: Lasting Perfume
Ghost Face.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
Increases the Reveal time for Survivors on a Hook to 3 seconds.

Ghost Face.name: Leather Knife Sheath
Ghost Face.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
Increases your Movement Speed by +10 % when Crouched.

Ghost Face.name: Olsen's Wallet
Ghost Face.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
Instantly recharges Night Shroud after breaking a Breakable Wall or a Pallet.

Ghost Face.name: Driver's License
Ghost Face.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity: Danny Johnson.
Causes Generators to explode and lose -20 % of its maximum possible Progression, when marking a Survivor repairing it, and blocks it for 15 seconds.
This penalty is only once if multiple repairing Survivors are marked.
"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is: who is next?" — The Ghost Face

Ghost Face.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
Ghost Face.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
Grants a +10 %  Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after marking a Survivors.
"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

Ghost Face.name: Night Vision Monocular
Ghost Face.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds after revealing you.

Ghost Face.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
Ghost Face.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds after marking them.
"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face

Ghost Face.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
Ghost Face.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
Instantly recharges Night Shroud after putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack.
"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida.The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area.Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette

Ghost Face.name: Outdoor Security Camera
Ghost Face.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 7 seconds after putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State.
"An image is worth a thousand words." — The Ghost Face

Demogorgon.name: Black Heart
Demogorgon.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks used to hit Survivors by -10 %.

Demogorgon.name: Rat Liver
Demogorgon.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
Increases your Movement speed while holding Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

Demogorgon.name: Rat Tail
Demogorgon.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +50 %.

Demogorgon.name: Rotten Pumpkin
Demogorgon.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
Causes the Portal from which you start your Teleport to seal automatically.
Grants +200 bonus Bloodpoints for Interdimensional Travel Score Events.

Demogorgon.name: Barb's Glasses
Demogorgon.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks used to break Breakable Walls or Pallets by -10 %.

Demogorgon.name: Mews' Guts
Demogorgon.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
Reduces the Attack cool-down of missed Shred Attacks by -11 %.
Increases the number of available Portals by +1.

Demogorgon.name: Rotten Green Tripe
Demogorgon.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
Increases your Teleportation speed by +15 %.

Demogorgon.name: Sticky Lining
Demogorgon.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Area of Effect of active Portals by +2.5 metres.

Demogorgon.name: Viscous Webbing
Demogorgon.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +16 %.

Demogorgon.name: Brass Case Lighter
Demogorgon.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect while closing Portals.
This effect lingers for 60 seconds.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Demogorgon.name: Deer Lung
Demogorgon.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
Increases your Teleportation speed by +30 %.
Reduces the number of available Portals by -2.

Demogorgon.name: Eleven's Soda
Demogorgon.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
The Auras of Generators actively being repaired by Survivors are highlighted to you in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

Demogorgon.name: Thorny Vines
Demogorgon.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Area of Effect of active Portals by +1 metre.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +11 %.

Demogorgon.name: Violet Waxcap
Demogorgon.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +1 second.

Demogorgon.name: Lifeguard Whistle
Demogorgon.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
Survivors entering the Area of Effect of an active Portal automatically trigger Killer Instinct.
Reduces the Area of Effect of active Portals by -1 metre.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Demogorgon.name: Unknown Egg
Demogorgon.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
Reduces the Recovery time of Of the Abyss by -2.5 seconds.
"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Demogorgon.name: Upside Down Resin
Demogorgon.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +40 %.
"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Demogorgon.name: Vermilion Webcap
Demogorgon.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +3 seconds.
"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Demogorgon.name: Leprose Lichen
Demogorgon.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you while traversing the Upside Down.
This effect lingers for 3 seconds for all Survivors within 16 metres of an active Portal.
"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Demogorgon.name: Red Moss
Demogorgon.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +8 seconds.
Suppresses all noise made while emerging from Portals.
Increases the time to emerge from Portals by +15 %.
"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory

Oni.name: Blackened Toenail
Oni.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
Increases your Movement speed while in Absorption Mode by 0.4 m/s.
"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12

Oni.name: Cracked Sakazuki
Oni.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.It never made it through the night before being damaged.
Reduces the Transition time into Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Transition time out of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.

Oni.name: Paper Lantern
Oni.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
Increases the Floating speed of Blood Orbs towards you when in Absorption Mode by +4 m/s.

Oni.name: Rotting Rope
Oni.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
Increases the Aura-reading range on Blood Orbs in the environment by +2 metres.
"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5

Oni.name: Bloody Sash
Oni.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor".Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
Increases your Movement speed while in Absorption Mode by 0.7 m/s.

Oni.name: Child's Wooden Sword
Oni.description:
Akito's practice sword.The child had little use for it after his injury.
Increases the Aura-reading range on Blood Orbs in the environment by +3 metres.

Oni.name: Chipped Saihai
Oni.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.

Oni.name: Ink Lion
Oni.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
Reduces the Transition time into Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Transition time out of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Power Gauge penalty for downing Survivors during Blood Fury by -2 seconds.

Oni.name: Polished Maedate
Oni.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
Increases the passive Charge rate of Blood Fury by +0.1 c/s.

Oni.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman
Oni.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
Increases your Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.

Oni.name: Scalped Topknot
Oni.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
Reduces the Charge time of Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.

Oni.name: Shattered Wakizashi
Oni.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
Increases the passive Charge rate of Blood Fury by +0.2 c/s.

Oni.name: Wooden Oni Mask
Oni.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
Increases the Spawn frequency of Blood Orbs from injured Survivors by +14 %.
Increases the number of Blood Orbs spawned when Survivors perform specific interactions by +1.
"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8

Oni.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
Oni.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.

Oni.name: Akito's Crutch
Oni.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
Increases your Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1 m/s.

Oni.name: Lion Fang
Oni.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.

Oni.name: Splintered Hull
Oni.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
Increases the Spawn frequency of Blood Orbs from injured Survivors by +33 %.
Increases the number of Blood Orbs spawned when Survivors perform specific interactions by +1.
"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9

Oni.name: Tear-Soaked Tenugui
Oni.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
Reduces the Power Gauge penalty for downing Survivors during Blood Fury by -4 seconds.

Oni.name: Iridescent Family Crest
Oni.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
Causes Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you after hitting the ground with a missed Demon Strike.
"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2

Oni.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove
Oni.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
The Auras of Survivors coming into contact with a Blood Orb are revealed to you for 2 seconds.
This effect stacks per Blood Orb.
Causes Blood Orbs to be visible to Survivors and to be absorbed when they come into contact with them.
"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12

Deathslinger.name: Modified Ammo Belt
Deathslinger.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
Reduces the Reload time of The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Rickety Chain
Deathslinger.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
Grants +50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
Increases the Break-Free speed of Survivors from The Redeemer by +33 %.

Deathslinger.name: Snake Oil
Deathslinger.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.Purported to cure all that ails you.
Increases the Reeling speed of The Redeemer by +5 %.

Deathslinger.name: Spit Polish Rag
Deathslinger.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Chewing Tobacco
Deathslinger.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.Stimulates the nervous system.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Jaw Smasher
Deathslinger.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases your Movement speed by +1.5 % during Aim Down Sights.
"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

Deathslinger.name: Marshal's Badge
Deathslinger.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres during Aim Down Sights.
"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

Deathslinger.name: Poison Oak Leaves
Deathslinger.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +1.5 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Rusted Spike
Deathslinger.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
Speared Survivors hit with the The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 60 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
Deathslinger.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
Increases the Reeling speed of The Redeemer by +9 %.
"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

Deathslinger.name: Honey Locust Thorn
Deathslinger.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
Speared Survivors breaking free from the The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Tin Oil Can
Deathslinger.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Wanted Poster
Deathslinger.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases your Movement speed by +3 % during Aim Down Sights.
"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn

Deathslinger.name: Warden's Keys
Deathslinger.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
Reduces the Reload time of The Redeemer by -0.35 seconds.

Deathslinger.name: Barbed Wire
Deathslinger.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +3.5 seconds.
"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn

Deathslinger.name: Bayshore's Cigar
Deathslinger.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.
"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

Deathslinger.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
Deathslinger.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -8 metres during Aim Down Sights.
"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

Deathslinger.name: Prison Chain
Deathslinger.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
Increases the Break-Free time of Survivors from The Redeemer by +10 %.
"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

Deathslinger.name: Hellshire Iron
Deathslinger.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect while a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
This effect lingers for 10 seconds.
"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline

Deathslinger.name: Iridescent Coin
Deathslinger.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect while speared by The Redeemer, if shot from at least 12 metres away.
"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."

Executioner.name: Black Strap
Executioner.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
Increases the reach of Punishment of the Damned Attacks by +0.5 metres.

Executioner.name: Copper Ring
Executioner.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
Increases the duration of Rites of Judgement by +1 second.
"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

Executioner.name: Dead Butterfly
Executioner.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
Reduces the Recovery time of Rites of Judgement by -2 seconds.

Executioner.name: Lead Ring
Executioner.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
Increases the duration of Torment Trails in the environment by +10 seconds.

Executioner.name: Cinderella Music Box
Executioner.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
Increases the duration of Torment Trails in the environment by +15 seconds.

Executioner.name: Forgotten Videotape
Executioner.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
Reduces the Recovery time of Rites of Judgement by -3 seconds.

Executioner.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
Executioner.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +0.5 seconds.
"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

Executioner.name: Spearhead
Executioner.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear.It is flaked with blood from its last victim.
Increases the duration of Rites of Judgement by +1.5 seconds.

Executioner.name: Wax Doll
Executioner.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
Increases the reach of Punishment of the Damned Attacks by +1 metre.

Executioner.name: Burning Man Painting
Executioner.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
Increases the reach of Punishment of the Damned Attacks by +1.5 metres.

Executioner.name: Mannequin Foot
Executioner.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
Increases the duration of Torment Trails in the environment by +20 seconds.

Executioner.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
Executioner.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1 second.

Executioner.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
Executioner.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
Increases the duration of Rites of Judgement by +2 seconds.

Executioner.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
Executioner.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods.Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
Reduces the Recovery time of Rites of Judgement by -4 seconds.

Executioner.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
Executioner.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
Survivors hit by Punishment of the Damned suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.
"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"

Executioner.name: Lost Memories Book
Executioner.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds when affected by Torment.
"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

Executioner.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
Executioner.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
Injured Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds when affected by Torment.
"James... you made me happy." — Maria

Executioner.name: Scarlet Egg
Executioner.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +3 seconds.
"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

Executioner.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
Executioner.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it.The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
The Auras of all other Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed to you for 6 seconds after sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement.
"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."

Executioner.name: Obsidian Goblet
Executioner.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect while standing on Torment Trails in the environment.
"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland

Blight.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
Blight.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
Increases the Throw speed of Bottles by +25 %.
Reduces the Throw angle of Bottles by -15 °.

Blight.name: Party Bottle
Blight.description:
Be the life of the party!
Bottles emit confetti when they break in addition to their usual effects.
Hitting Survivors directly with a Bottle grants 100 bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

Blight.name: Robin Feather
Blight.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Bottle throws by -40 %.

Blight.name: VHS Porn
Blight.description:
An all time classic.You will not see things quite the same again.
Switches the colours of the Gas Clouds with one another.

Blight.name: Kerosene Can
Blight.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
Survivors affected by Intoxication suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

Blight.name: Solvent Jug
Blight.description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
Increases the Invigoration duration by +1 second.

Blight.name: Starling Feather
Blight.description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Bottle throws by -50 %.

Blight.name: Sticky Soda Bottle
Blight.description:
It's sugary sweet, with only a little blood on the label.
Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect from Invigoration by +2 % .

Blight.name: Thick Cork Stopper
Blight.description:
A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously.
Reduces the Reload time of the Bottles by -0.5 seconds.

Blight.name: Bottle of Chloroform
Blight.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
Increases the size and spread of the Intoxication Gas Clouds by +20 %.

Blight.name: Flask of Bleach
Blight.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect Survivors suffer from during Intoxication by an additional -4 %.

Blight.name: Smelly Inner Soles
Blight.description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
Increases your Movement speed while reloading Bottles by +66 %.

Blight.name: Spirit of Hartshorn
Blight.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
Increases the size and spread of the Invigoration Gas Clouds by +20 %.

Blight.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
Blight.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
Survivors affected by Intoxication suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

Blight.name: Cheap Gin Bottle
Blight.description:
When the night is rough and the day is rougher, a little hair of the dog will give you a boost.
Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect from Invigoration by +3 % .

Blight.name: Cigar Box
Blight.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
The Auras of all other Players within 16 metres of their location are revealed to Invigorated Players for 6 seconds.

Blight.name: Ether 15 Vol%
Blight.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
Increases the Intoxication duration by +1 second.

Blight.name: Garish Make-Up Kit
Blight.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote.The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
Increases the Invigoration duration by +2 seconds.

Blight.name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger
Blight.description:
The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.Faintly fragrant.Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
Survivors hit directly by Bottles suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they are affected by Intoxication.
Reduces the number of carried Bottles to 1.
This number cannot be modified by other Add-ons.

Blight.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
Blight.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
The Auras of Survivors afflicted by either Intoxication or Invigoration are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Twins.name: Cat Figurine
Twins.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of a Pounce.

Twins.name: Soured Milk
Twins.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.

Twins.name: Tiny Fingernail
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.25 seconds.

Twins.name: Toy Sword
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.1 second.

Twins.name: Baby Teeth
Twins.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.They are unusually sharp.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds after removing Victor.

Twins.name: Bloody Black Hood
Twins.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.Soon, he became the prey.
Reduces the Transition time when switching back to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.

Twins.name: Cat's Eye
Twins.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
Suppresses all noise made by Victor while holding a Pounce.

Twins.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
Twins.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.A symbol of his tenacity.
Increases the Crushing time of Victor by +0.2 seconds when controlling Charlotte.

Twins.name: Madeleine's Glove
Twins.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.

Twins.name: Madeleine's Scarf
Twins.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.The Twins kept it as a memento.
Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.3 m/s.
"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the Death of Madeleine Deshayes

Twins.name: Rusted Needle
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
Survivors hit with a Pounce Attack suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

Twins.name: Sewer Sludge
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
Reduces the Crawling speed of downed Survivors with Victor attached to them by -25 %.

Twins.name: Stale Biscuit
Twins.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.It was not much, but it was better than most meals.
Reduces the Cool-down time of a Pounce by -0.4 seconds.

Twins.name: Weighty Rattle
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
Survivors hit with a Pounce Attack suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

Twins.name: Drop of Perfume
Twins.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect within Victor's Shriek range when controlling Charlotte.
"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons, 1602

Twins.name: Forest Stew
Twins.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.6 m/s.
"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

Twins.name: Spinning Top
Twins.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
Causes Survivors hit with a Pounce to drop any carried Item.
"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

Twins.name: Victor's Soldier
Twins.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds after crushing Victor when controlling Charlotte.
"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

Twins.name: Iridescent Pendant
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
Successful Pounce Attacks grant a stack-able +2 % Haste Status Effect to both Victor and Charlotte, up to a maximum of +8 %.
This effect is reset when a Survivor enters the Dying State by any means.
"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

Twins.name: Silencing Cloth
Twins.description:
This description is based on the changes featured in the upcoming Patch: 7.7.0A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
Whenever Victor is crushed, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.
"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

Trickster.name: Inferno Wires
Trickster.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
Extends the duration of Main Event by +25 %.

Trickster.name: Killing Part Chords
Trickster.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.04 m/s.

Trickster.name: Memento Blades
Trickster.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
Increases the Throw rate of Blades by +10 %.

Trickster.name: Trick Pouch
Trickster.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
Increases the number of carried Blades by +4.

Trickster.name: Caged Heart Shoes
Trickster.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.1 m/s.

Trickster.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
Trickster.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +10 %.

Trickster.name: Lucky Blade
Trickster.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.3 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.

Trickster.name: On Target Single
Trickster.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +2 seconds.

Trickster.name: Tequila Moonrock
Trickster.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
Increases the duration of Main Event by +50 %.

Trickster.name: Bloody Boa
Trickster.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.A number of pockets are concealed within it.
Increases the number of carried Blades by +8.

Trickster.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
Trickster.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.High sugar and caffeine content.
Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +15 %.

Trickster.name: Melodious Murder
Trickster.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
Reduces the Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

Trickster.name: Ripper Brace
Trickster.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +3 seconds.

Trickster.name: Waiting For You Watch
Trickster.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.4 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.
"Don't run awayDon't say we're throughNo way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN'S "Waiting For You"

Trickster.name: Cut Thru U Single
Trickster.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
Causes Blades to pierce through the first Survivor they hit and continue travelling.
Any second Survivor hit only receives 0.5 Charges to their Laceration Meter.
"Can't stop this loveThat's tearing your heartWherever you goI will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"

Trickster.name: Diamond Cufflinks
Trickster.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
The Auras of Survivors one hit away from maximum Laceration are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

Trickster.name: Edge of Revival Album
Trickster.description:
The Trickster's debut album.The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
Causes Blades to shatter when hitting the environment, adding +0.5 Charges to the Laceration Meter of nearby Survivors.
"Your whisper on meWarm as can beBurning each breathTill I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

Trickster.name: Trick Blades
Trickster.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
Causes Blades to ricochet off the environment a total of two times.

Trickster.name: Death Throes Compilation
Trickster.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.Terrifying and emotionally raw.
The Auras of Survivors hit during Main Event are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice

Trickster.name: Iridescent Photocard
Trickster.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
Grants a stack-able +1 % Haste Status Effect, up to a maximum of +7 %, for each consecutive Blade Hit.
This effect is lost when missing a Blade or damaging a Survivor.
"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak

Nemesis.name: Brian's Intestine
Nemesis.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.It is an appetising sight for zombies.
Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.25 m/s.

Nemesis.name: Damaged Syringe
Nemesis.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
Increases the Injection time of Vaccines by +5 seconds.

Nemesis.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
Nemesis.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
The Auras of Survivors hit by Zombies are highlighted to you in yellow for 6 seconds.

Nemesis.name: Visitor Wristband
Nemesis.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.It also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +2 metres.
Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +10 °.

Nemesis.name: Admin Wristband
Nemesis.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +4 metres.
Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +17.5 °.

Nemesis.name: Adrenaline Injector
Nemesis.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
Increases the Duration of Killer Instinct after a Survivor uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

Nemesis.name: Marvin's Blood
Nemesis.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.
"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you're not careful." — Marvin Branagh

Nemesis.name: Mikhail's Eye
Nemesis.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.35 m/s.

Nemesis.name: Zombie Heart
Nemesis.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.
"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy

Nemesis.name: Licker Tongue
Nemesis.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
Increases the Duration of the Hindered Status Effect when becoming Contaminated by +0.2 seconds.
"It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield

Nemesis.name: Plant 43 Vines
Nemesis.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
Increases the Opening time of Supply Cases by +4 seconds.

Nemesis.name: Serotonin Injector
Nemesis.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, after a Zombie is disintegrated by any means.

Nemesis.name: T-Virus Sample
Nemesis.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +1 point.

Nemesis.name: Tyrant Gore
Nemesis.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.There are signs of severe burns.
Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -7.5 seconds.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.

Nemesis.name: Broken Recovery Coin
Nemesis.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.It is broken in half.
Reduces the number of Supply Cases in the environment by -1.
"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy

Nemesis.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
Nemesis.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -5 seconds.
Increases the Movement speed of Zombies by +0.5 m/s.
Once the Exit Gates are powered, disintegrated Zombies respawn in the Exit area.
"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine

Nemesis.name: Jill's Sandwich
Nemesis.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
The Auras of Survivors unlocking a Supply Case are revealed to you for 12 seconds after they succeed.

Nemesis.name: Ne-α Parasite
Nemesis.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after becoming Contaminated, or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.

Nemesis.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
Nemesis.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds after using a Vaccine.
"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Doctor Matt Gorkis

Nemesis.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
Nemesis.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds each time a Generator is completed.
"S.T.A.R.S..." — The Nemesis

Cenobite.name: Bent Nail
Cenobite.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Events.
Reduces the number of bonus Chains spawned when Survivors are hit with a Possessed Chain Attack to +1.

Cenobite.name: Burning Candle
Cenobite.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
Reduces the Timer duration for starting a Chain Hunt by -3 seconds.

Cenobite.name: Leather Strip
Cenobite.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
Reduces the Cool-down time of a Possessed Chain Attack by -0.15 seconds.

Cenobite.name: Lively Crickets
Cenobite.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
Increases the Turn rate of the Possessed Chain by +10 %.

Cenobite.name: Flickering Television
Cenobite.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
Increases the maximum Casting distance of the Gateway by +4 metres.

Cenobite.name: Liquified Gore
Cenobite.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
Increases the Solving time of the Lament Configuration by +1 second.

Cenobite.name: Skewered Rat
Cenobite.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
Reduces the Cool-down time of a Possessed Chain Attack by -0.45 seconds.

Cenobite.name: Spoiled Meal
Cenobite.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
Increases the maximum range of the Possessed Chain by +2 metres.

Cenobite.name: Wriggling Maggots
Cenobite.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
Increases the Turn rate of the Possessed Chain by +15 %.

Cenobite.name: Frank's Heart
Cenobite.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
Increases the maximum Casting distance of the Gateway by +8 metres.
"Nobody escapes us." — Pinhead

Cenobite.name: Larry's Blood
Cenobite.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
Increases the maximum range of the Possessed Chain by +4 metres.

Cenobite.name: Larry's Remains
Cenobite.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
Increases the Solving time of the Lament Configuration by +2 seconds.
"We want the man who did this." — Pinhead

Cenobite.name: Slice of Frank
Cenobite.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect while carrying the Lament Configuration.
"The Cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits. Pain and pleasure, indivisible." — Frank Cotton

Cenobite.name: Torture Pillar
Cenobite.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
Reduces the Timer duration for starting a Chain Hunt by -6 seconds.
"This isn't for your eyes." — Pinhead

Cenobite.name: Chatterer's Tooth
Cenobite.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
Grants the ability to see the Aura of the Lament Configuration.
Picking up the Lament Configuration deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt and grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

Cenobite.name: Greasy Black Lens
Cenobite.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to for 6 seconds after hitting them with a Possessed Chain Attack.

Cenobite.name: Impaling Wire
Cenobite.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
Causes a bonus Chain to spawn on Bound Survivors, when they use the environment to break one.

Cenobite.name: Original Pain
Cenobite.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.Such pleasure and pain.
Survivors suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect after breaking from the Possessed Chain.
"No tears, please. It's a waste of good suffering." — Pinhead

Cenobite.name: Engineer's Fang
Cenobite.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
Causes healthy Survivors to become injured when hit with a Possessed Chain Attack, but does not bind them with additional Chains.
This increases the Closing time of the Gateway by +0.25 seconds.
Reduces the number of bonus Chains spawned when injured Survivors are hit with a Possessed Chain Attack to +1.
"We have such sights to show you." — Pinhead

Cenobite.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
Cenobite.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
Shields the Aura of the Lament Configuration from Survivors who are farther than 24 metres from it outside of a Chain Hunt.
"You opened it. We came." — Pinhead

Artist.name: Choclo Corn
Artist.description:
A type of corn common in South America.A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
Increases the Timer before idle Dire Crows disintegrate by +2 seconds.

Artist.name: Oil Paints
Artist.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
Increases the Detection radius of Killer Instinct by +1.5 metres.

Artist.name: Thick Tar
Artist.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
Increases the Repel duration for Swarmed Survivors by +0.5 seconds.

Artist.name: Vibrant Obituary
Artist.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +3 seconds.

Artist.name: Automatic Drawing
Artist.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.Do not think — act.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment by -1.5 seconds after idle Dire Crows disintegrate.

Artist.name: Festering Carrion
Artist.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment by -0.5 seconds after launching Dire Crows.

Artist.name: Still Life Crow
Artist.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
Increases the Timer before idle Dire Crows disintegrate by +4 seconds.

Artist.name: Untitled Agony
Artist.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
Swarmed Survivors suffer from a -15 % Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.

Artist.name: Velvet Fabric
Artist.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
The Auras of Swarms continue to be revealed to you for another 1.5 seconds after Survivors start repelling them.

Artist.name: Charcoal Stick
Artist.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
The Auras Dire Crows mid-flight are no longer visible to Survivors.
The Auras of Dire Crows are visible to Survivors for 0.5 seconds after summoning them.

Artist.name: Darkest Ink
Artist.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
Swarmed Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
This effect lingers for 15 seconds after repelling the Swarm.

Artist.name: O Grief, O Lover
Artist.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
Swarmed Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

Artist.name: Silver Bell
Artist.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
Swarmed Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

Artist.name: Thorny Nest
Artist.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds after being damaged by Dire Crows.

Artist.name: Ink Egg
Artist.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
Increases the number of summonable Dire Crows by +1.
Reduces the Timer before idle Dire Crows disintegrate by -2 seconds.
"Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." — Carmina Mora

Artist.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
Artist.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of idle Dire Crows are revealed to you for 3 seconds.
"See you soon, Matias." — Carmina Mora

Artist.name: Severed Hands
Artist.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
Causes Survivors coming within 3 metres of Swarmed Survivors to become swarmed too.
"How are you going to paint now?" — Hooded Man

Artist.name: Severed Tongue
Artist.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
Reduces your Slow-down time by -0.5 seconds after launching Dire Crows.
"How are you going to tell poems now?" — Hooded Man

Artist.name: Garden of Rot
Artist.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 4 seconds after repelling the Swarm.
"I see no salvation in the rot." — Carmina Mora

Artist.name: Iridescent Feather
Artist.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect when Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and you hold no Dire Crows.
Reduces the number of summonable Dire Crows by -1.
"They saved me when I could not save myself." — Carmina Mora

Onryo.name: Cabin Sign
Onryo.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.Carries the memory of those first curses.
Reduces the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by -4.5 seconds.

Onryo.name: Mother's Mirror
Onryo.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
Increases the duration of your intermittent Invisibility after Manifesting by +2 seconds.

Onryo.name: Old Newspaper
Onryo.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
Increases the duration of your full Invisibility after Manifesting by +33 %.

Onryo.name: Videotape Copy
Onryo.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.It dampens the desire for vengeance.
Extends the radius around TVs within which Survivors gain Condemned from Projection by +2 metres.

Onryo.name: Clump of Hair
Onryo.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
Reduces the threshold for full Invisibility while Demanifested by -4 metres.

Onryo.name: Reiko's Watch
Onryo.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
Increases the duration of your full Invisibility while Demanifested by +25 %.

Onryo.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
Onryo.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect when within 8 metres of powered TVs.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after turning off a TV.

Onryo.name: Well Stone
Onryo.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
Reduces the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by -7 seconds.

Onryo.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
Onryo.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.A reminder that death comes to us all.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect after acquiring at least 4 Stacks of Condemned.

Onryo.name: Bloody Fingernails
Onryo.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
Increases the Speed Boost duration after Projection by +50 %.

Onryo.name: Mother's Comb
Onryo.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
Highlights the Auras of all turned-off TVs in yellow.
Causes TVs being turned off to trigger a Loud Noise Notification.

Onryo.name: Rickety Pinwheel
Onryo.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect when within 8 metres of powered TVs.
This effect lingers for 7 seconds after turning off a TV.

Onryo.name: Ring Drawing
Onryo.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
Hooking a Survivor carrying a VHS Tape causes all other Survivors to gain +1 Stack of Condemned.

Onryo.name: Well Water
Onryo.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds after Manifesting by any means.

Onryo.name: Distorted Photo
Onryo.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
Causes all Survivors within 16 metres of your location who witness your Manifestation to scream and reveal their Auras for 4 seconds.
"Why is it only you were saved?" — Sadaoka Yamamura

Onryo.name: Tape Editing Deck
Onryo.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
Causes all Survivors start the Trial with a VHS Tape.
All Survivors must bring their VHS Tape to the TV that is farthest from their current location.
The Auras of Survivors inserting a VHS Tape into a TV are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sakado's Tape

Onryo.name: Telephone
Onryo.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
Survivors suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds when Manifesting within 7 metres of them.
"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi

Onryo.name: VCR
Onryo.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's Tape.It is still warm to the touch.
Causes all TVs to play the Projection Effects when using Projection.

Onryo.name: Iridescent Videotape
Onryo.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
Projection no longer turns off TVs, but also no longer applies any Condemned.
Increases the time required for TVs to turn back on after having been turned off by Survivors by +20 %.
"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." — Ryuji Takayama

Onryo.name: Remote Control
Onryo.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
The Auras of all Survivors within 12 metres of powered TVs are revealed to you for 7 seconds after using Projection.
"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." — Ryuji Takayama

Dredge.name: Caffeine Tablets
Dredge.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
The Auras of locked Lockers are highlighted to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

Dredge.name: Follower's Cowl
Dredge.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
Returning to the Remnant triggers Killer Instinct during Daytime.

Dredge.name: Mortar and Pestle
Dredge.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
You emerge from the Remnant facing your direction at the moment of Teleportation, rather than the one in which you had placed the Remnant.

Dredge.name: Wooden Plank
Dredge.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
Increases the Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking Survivors by +25 %.

Dredge.name: Air Freshener
Dredge.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
Increases the number of available Power Tokens to 4.

Dredge.name: Burnt Letters
Dredge.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
Increases the Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring Survivors by +25 %.

Dredge.name: Fallen Shingle
Dredge.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
Increases the Charge rate of the Nightfall Meter while using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

Dredge.name: Haddie's Calendar
Dredge.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
Reduces the Exiting time of locked Lockers by -1 second.

Dredge.name: Malthinker's Skull
Dredge.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
Increases the Charge rate of the Nightfall Meter while Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.

Dredge.name: Broken Doll
Dredge.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.None of them were spared.
Increases the duration of Nightfall by +20 seconds.

Dredge.name: Destroyed Pillow
Dredge.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
Reduces the Cool-down time of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

Dredge.name: Ottomarian Writing
Dredge.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
Reduces the Cool-down time of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Daytime.

Dredge.name: War Helmet
Dredge.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

Dredge.name: Worry Stone
Dredge.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
The Auras of Survivors locking a Locker are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

Dredge.name: Boat Key
Dredge.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
Increases your Teleportation speed during Daytime by +25 %.
Causes all active Locks on Lockers to break once the Exit Gates are powered by any means.

Dredge.name: Field Recorder
Dredge.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
Causes the Trial to start in Nightfall.
Causes Nightfall to activate automatically once the last Generator is completed.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds after coming into contact with the Remnant.

Dredge.name: Lavalier Microphone
Dredge.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds after consuming the last Power Token.
Causes all Lockers within 6 metres of Survivors to open and slam their doors when entering them through teleporation.

Dredge.name: Tilling Blade
Dredge.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage,  and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds after becoming injured during Nightfall.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

Dredge.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
Dredge.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the last 12 seconds of Nightfall.
"She came here to poison your minds with fear! Do not let the fear in!" — Otto Stamper

Dredge.name: Sacrificial Knife
Dredge.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
Blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of the Locker you emerge from for 5 seconds.
"There are imposters amongst you! They intend to destroy our perfect home with dark thoughts. Find them and bring them to me!" — Otto Stamper

Mastermind.name: Jewel Beetle
Mastermind.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect.While difficult to capture, it is worth a pretty penny.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound Score Events.
Reduces the remaining duration of a Bound by -50 % after colliding with a Survivor.

Mastermind.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie
Mastermind.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.
Reduces the duration of the first Bound by -20 %.
Increases the duration of the second Bound by +20 %.

Mastermind.name: Unicorn Medallion
Mastermind.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn.It was placed in storage for years.
Increases the duration of the first Bound by +20 %.
Reduces the duration of the second Bound by -20 %.

Mastermind.name: Uroboros Tendril
Mastermind.description:
The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research.It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.
Increases your Movement speed while charging Virulent Bound by +5 %.

Mastermind.name: Bullhorn
Mastermind.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 30 seconds after using a First Aid Spray.

Mastermind.name: Chalice (Gold)
Mastermind.description:
A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.
Increases the remaining duration of a Bound by +50 % after colliding with a Survivor.

Mastermind.name: Leather Gloves
Mastermind.description:
Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer.They impart an air of icy professionalism.
Reduces the Power Recharge time by -10 %.

Mastermind.name: Lion Medallion
Mastermind.description:
An old medallion depicting a brave lion.It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.
Increases the Throw distance of Survivors grabbed Mid-Bound by +30 %.

Mastermind.name: Loose Crank
Mastermind.description:
To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.
Increases your Movement speed during the Chain Bound Window by +8 %.

Mastermind.name: Egg (Gold)
Mastermind.description:
A highly coveted foodstuff.The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.
Increases the duration of the Chain Bound Window by +50 %.

Mastermind.name: Maiden Medallion
Mastermind.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden.Its purpose was unknown for many years.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.

Mastermind.name: Portable Safe
Mastermind.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.
Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed when injured using Virulent Bound.

Mastermind.name: Red Herb
Mastermind.description:
Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.
Increases the Healing time of the First Aid Spray by +2 seconds.

Mastermind.name: Video Conference Device
Mastermind.description:
Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.
Reduces the Infection timer of Survivors by -30 %.

Mastermind.name: Dark Sunglasses
Mastermind.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds whenever a Survivors reaches Critical Infection.

Mastermind.name: Green Herb
Mastermind.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.
Increases the Infection applied when colliding with Survivors Mid-Bound by +30 %.

Mastermind.name: Helicopter Stick
Mastermind.description:
Debris from a helicopter crash.Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot's when Wesker is involved.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 8 seconds after using a First Aid Spray.

Mastermind.name: Uroboros Virus
Mastermind.description:
For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.
"The balance of the world is changing… and you're completely oblivious to it." — Ricardo Irving

Mastermind.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial
Mastermind.description:
The perfect bio-weapon.Decades of research have led to this.
Causes all Survivors to start the Trial infected with Uroboros.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.
"The entire world will be infected. A new Genesis is at hand and I will be the creator!" — Albert Wesker

Mastermind.name: Lab Photo
Mastermind.description:
Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.
Grants the ability to break Breakable Walls or Pallets when colliding with them Mid-Bound.
You can no longer vault over Pallets using Virulent Bound.
"Only a handful of humans truly matter. Everyone else is just so much chaff. So now I have to separate this chaff from the wheat." — Albert Wesker

Knight.name: Counterweight
Knight.description:
Adds weight to the base, for stability.
Reduces the initial Turn rate of the Chainsaw during a Chainsaw Sprint by -70 %.

Knight.name: Cracked Primer Bulb
Knight.description:
A button that clears air from the fuel lines.This machine needs to be fed.
Increases the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by +15 %.
Survivors hit with the Chainsaw are only damaged for a single Health State.

Knight.name: Dad's Boots
Knight.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
Increases the Turn speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +30 %.

Knight.name: Steel Toe Boots
Knight.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -10 %.

Knight.name: Clogged Intake
Knight.description:
Modifying the airflow is key to modifying the Chainsaw's power.
Extends the duration of Overdrive by +15 %.

Knight.name: Greased Throttle
Knight.description:
A lubricated trigger.One twitch of the finger brings the Chainsaw back to life.
Reduces the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by -5 %, when not in Overdrive.

Knight.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
Knight.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
Increases the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by +15 %.

Knight.name: Spiked Boots
Knight.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +45 %.

Knight.name: Thermal Casing
Knight.description:
A thicker case that allows the user to control the conservation of energy.
Reduces the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by -20 %.
